string-array.name: choice1
string-array.item: Convince the teacher to write the test next lesson.
Start to cry and say that you are not this person. Your only hope is that he believes you.
Tell him that you calculated something important and can\'t answer his question
Ask your classmates some questions about the test and let them ask you some questions too.
Ask the teacher if he could explain it again for you.
Take some money and leave it there.
Just do something with your friends and enjoy the time.
You say you are going to do something else.
Nothing, just try to withstand the heat.
Just chill the whole time and maybe to something with your friends.
